website_summaries.verdict: These terrific stainless steel Weber tongs are perfect for all of your BBQ or cooking needs. The soft-touch handles offer a comfortable grip, and the handles lock for compact storage.
pros: 17 inches in length to keep hands away from the heat
cons: Some have said they don't love the teeth on the tongs for cooking certain items

customer_reviews.title: Solid, heavy duty, well built.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy duty and well built. I bought these to replace my Pamered Chef set that I had for 7 years. I have no doubt that I will get 7+ years of use out of these. I grill about 1-2 times a week on average, so they get used and abused. Will stand up to the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A Schriefer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length - open/close mechanism could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my hands away from the very hot surface of my grill - and these tongs do exactly that. The length is perfect when searing steaks or vegetables on a really hot grill but I wish that Weber had paid a little more attention to the open/close mechanism. Weber went for a very traditional open/close mechanism that feel flimsy and have a tendency to get stuck when you want to open or close in a hurry. Maybe a more substantial mechanism would fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: DaDane

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had to get another pair of tongs for my grill when using two grills. Yes I use propane and charcoal in combination sometimes and don't want to use tongs for raw vs cooked food. These has teeth on the end. The previous model of these the grip was on the tip. This one has more grip for flipping chicken or steak over. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I realize that you probably are wondering how you could make a set of bbq tongs and have a bad design. I purchased this to replace the tongs in a KitchenAid set. The arms of this set are metal all they way to the top. The KitchenAid was not and snapped off in the middle of using them. Stick with tongs that are metal all the way to the hinge at the top!
customer_reviews.author: K.D. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Best tongs I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're a little bigger than my others, feel very sturdy (but not too heavy), and seem to be very well made! I spend a lot of time between my three BBQs/smokers and am constantly looking for the right tools. These tongs my finally be my answer! Nothing short of what I would expect from Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Bado

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bbq tongs
customer_reviews.text: These things are beasts, and we love them! They can handle any bbq job you have. We have used them for 1.5 lb steaks, burgers, hot dogs, you name it. They are rather large compared to most tongs, but that's what makes them amazing. We love them! Highly recommend for anyone that bbq's often.
customer_reviews.author: Christell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I researched several similar products and went with this one. You’re never quite sure what you have until you actually use it. Winner! This is a heavy duty, sturdy set of tongs. I’ve always used cheap flimsy tongs but these are awesome and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable, well made tongs.
customer_reviews.text: The Weber name meant I expected a quality product, and I was not disappointed. These tongs are strong, easy to use and have a real good positive feel to them. They're long enough to keep your hands comfortable while using them over a hot grill, but not so long as to be cumbersome. And they grip well, without tearing your food to shreds when flipping. Buy these tongs, you'll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent C

customer_reviews.title: Big Boy
customer_reviews.text: Even a Bear would like these. They are solid-one more time-solid. Definitely for the MAN! Great grip and solid quality. This product is worth buying. jd
customer_reviews.author: eom

customer_reviews.title: Nice and long for bbq'ing - it is pretty substantial ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long for bbq'ing - it is pretty substantial in the hands causing a bit of awkwardness in handling it, I guess it probably takes getting used to for female hands. It's much more substantial than per se a nice pair of Oxo Grips tongs as they are slimmer and much lighter than this Weber.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyKate

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchase this BBQ tong a long time ago. It doesn't cost that much more than the cheaper made one and it's so much better in quality and ease of use. Saves the hand from staying on top of the grill for too long as one doesn't have to struggle with grabbing the food securely.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tran

customer_reviews.title: It's like it was dumped in a bucket of sand before ...
customer_reviews.text: The hinge is gritty feeling and makes a grinding noise when opening/closing. It does close all the way, but not without a fight. It's like it was dumped in a bucket of sand before being shipped. There is no way the one I received was QC'd. The handle coating feels very thin as well. Because of that, the overall feeling of these tongs are cheap and disappointing. I had a pair of Weber tongs that came in a set from Home Depot years ago that went missing and I figured I would just replace them with these. They are not the same. It's a night and day comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and store
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my husband, who likes to grill and use the smoker. Our tongs were older and did not lock, so now these are easier to store. They are a good weight and grip the steaks and burgers making them easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, strong, heavy duty. No bending or twisting under loads.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, heavy duty tongs. These are very solid, they can handle heavy stuff without any worry of bending or twisting. Whish I had bought these years ago instead of using the cheap pairs the would bend on heavy cuts. Get them, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Woolval

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Grill Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Great for the grill. Tongs are long enough that you don't feel the heat of the grill. Ridges that you can grasp the meat without fear of dropping it. Folds down easily with a nice hook to hang.
customer_reviews.author: mountain girl

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs. I plan on getting my family members each  a set
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. They are extremely sturdy giving you control of whatever you’re grilling. Besides being made with thicker gauge metal the hinge lines up the ends perfectly without any wobble or loose side to side movements
customer_reviews.author: Kauluhala

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a tongs game changer! It's so sturdy that I can lift up my entire full size Weber grill grate with just 1 tong. The added teeth in the front gives such good grip. The handle is so comfortable. They did an excellent job on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Scora

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I replace this with two Webster tongs which are excellent Thai one feels cheap and does not close evenly.. Save your money and buy quality. I will be throwing these out and sucking up the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A Real Pair Of Tongs - Glad I  Found These
customer_reviews.text: Not only can you turn a hot dog with these without searing your hand but you could turn half a cow with them. They don't deflect like other poorly made tongs do. The jaws have great gripping power too.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Knows - Usually :-)

customer_reviews.title: Can cut
customer_reviews.text: Be careful with the hinge! It can cut like scissors if you accidentally get your fingers there. Hard to get under the items on the grill. Otherwise a solid and sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: AL DJS

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: The way grill tongs are meant to be. Sturdy, dishwashable, long and padded. They won’t cut your hands up like cheap tongs, and they work well to manage everything on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Knuckles

customer_reviews.title: Tongs for life
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy flimsy tings. It’s important to have strength to pick up hot delicate food around a hot grill.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Maddocks

customer_reviews.title: Loooong
customer_reviews.text: Very long. It's a work out for me handling these. Just kidding but they are extremely long. That's good thing when dealing with hot grills though. I have had them for a month they seem like they will hold up for some years.
customer_reviews.author: Blu-Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They r kind of big for my hands but perfect for my husband's. Very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hope D.

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are solid and the rubber cladding keeps them cool in the hand when using them on a large quantity of food.
customer_reviews.author: janets98

customer_reviews.title: Pos
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product Had less than-a week All rusted Never again
customer_reviews.author: Wayne C. Wind

customer_reviews.title: Spring resistance is too weak,otherwise great grill tong!
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars only because i wish the spring was tougher,otherwise great tong. For me personally the i would like something with more resistance when i squeeze it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Grrrreat!
customer_reviews.text: I love these tongs. They are sturdy, leightweight, easy to lock/unlock. No issues with heat resistance, great length and grip. I’ll be adding another set to my grill tool collection soon!
customer_reviews.author: Old Man

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Great barbecue tongs. What else is there to say? They do the job they were made to do.
customer_reviews.author: neil koelemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't go underneath meat very well
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these tongs in hopes of using them to flip steaks on a small grilling grate on an infrared burner. The tongs have a difficult time slipping under the steak over a stainless steel surface. Wish I had bought a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P.

customer_reviews.title: great grip
customer_reviews.text: They grip my steak nice and tight. No more floor steaks here!
customer_reviews.author: phazon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what expected. Easy to use, easy to clean. Comfortable handle.
customer_reviews.author: AnBu

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I wanted it for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for handling lump charcoal so it meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Newsreaders

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy but the quality seems to lack a little
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and a good length. They are my go to for all my grilling items.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Very good Tongs, good length provides good reach, and the design enables you to pick up very small and thin food, like asparagus, while handling the biggest steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Cary L. AdlerSpa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and super long, never get hot when barbequeing!
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I really love these quality Tongs. There is nothing like having the tools that feel good inyoyr hands. Dont go for cheaper products.
customer_reviews.author: Danson G. Tolman

customer_reviews.title: Weber is still the best.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of bbq tongs as you would expect from Weber. All of their products are “ top of the line”.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cote

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not made well.
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at how bad these feel in hand for a Weber product. Also, the locking system feels poorly made and sticks. I’d go with an OXO brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: E. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Tongs are Huge, Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: Much longer than your everyday grill tongs. Typical tongs are 16-17", these are over 20". Teeth are so chunky that manipulating anything smaller than a steak is nearly impossible .Hinge is very flimsy, ends don't even align when closed.
customer_reviews.author: SeawayFreeway

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: If you want quality tongs, these are the ones to buy. I will probably lose them before they ever wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Art B

customer_reviews.title: Love this things
customer_reviews.text: Love this things, all my previous tongs were the cheap ones where after a couple months the rivet in the hinge would give out. These seem extremely sturdy. So far I love these, had them about 6 weeks, and they get used every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great grilling tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean, easy use and the right size for grill
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Well built, long, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality and long enough to avoid getting burned during flareups.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: The longer length is perfect for barbecuing over hot coals
customer_reviews.text: The longer length is perfect for barbecuing over hot coals. Much more heavy duty than your traditional kitchen tongues. Would definitely recommend these to anyone who does a lot of outdoor grilling. Very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: EllenDF

customer_reviews.title: Good product for Steak or pork chops
customer_reviews.text: Good product for Steak or pork chops. Not as good for chicken wings due to the teeth on the tongs. Will tear the skin. Other than that i like the length the look and the feel. Nice hook to lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy31

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than expected but solid and very well made
customer_reviews.author: Tony Montana

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. No complaints. I would buy more as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grips well and keeps me away from the hot fire.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D. Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs beside 1 thing
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs beside 1 thing... The rubberized part of the handle is too easily detached from the metal and cannot be put back. Otherwise these are the right size and has a firm grip.
customer_reviews.author: Rachk426

customer_reviews.title: Best tongs ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tongs ever. I do a plethora of grilling/smoking and have had many pairs of tongs. These are by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tongs for BBQ you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: These tongs have teeth that grab the food well and most do not have this. It is very well made with one exception. After awhile the metal logo piece mid way up will fall off and you have to snap it back on or super glue. Nice ring to hang it with.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of thongs
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of thongs. Nice size and easy to handle. I know that they take less room when locked shut, but I store mine open as the spring stays strong and never a problem opening.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Hanger

customer_reviews.title: Weber 6610 Original Tongs are Great!
customer_reviews.text: A Heavy Duty Practical Tongs for the Grill or FirePit! Dan Johnston, Fargo ND
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy long handled tongs
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy long handled tongs. They do NOT bend when trying to pick up something the size and weight off a large potato. Best tongs for grilling I have ever owned, and very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Good tongs for roasting
customer_reviews.text: Picks up full size beef roast no problem (tri tip). Very sturdy, no slip.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Long, solid construction
customer_reviews.text: They are nice long stainless barbecue tongs. Used a few times over the summer on the grill and smoker and over the winter in the oven. Would purchase again if I needed a very long set of tongs.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: For the price, they are clunky
customer_reviews.text: For the price and name Weber, I expected a little better quality as they are a bit clunky. When you close them, the ends slip apart from one-another. Hard to explain.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them! Easy to use and makes grilling easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best tongs out there
customer_reviews.text: I grill every week and these are the best tongs that I’ve come across. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good tongs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to go with my new Weber Genesis S-330. A great looking and cooking grill deserves nice accessories. Sturdy, attractive, easy to clean. Expensive, but all Weber products are, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: 5 String

customer_reviews.title: Oh go on and get them...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby, the "grill master" at our house loves them. His exact words "Why didn't I get these sooner?"
customer_reviews.author: OkieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought these to have a good set of tongs for bbqing at my parents house
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are good tongs, nice and big and I like the lock on the end for the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Great Price - Too Long
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are of very high quality but simply TOO large. You can barely manipulate your food on the grill as you have to stand 12 to 18 inches away from the heat source. Other than than...good buy for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Windham

customer_reviews.title: The teeth are shaped better than other tongs I've tried
customer_reviews.text: The teeth are shaped better than other tongs I've tried. It doesn't push too hard against your hand, taking tons of hand strength to lift a steak. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Henrie

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 Tongs
customer_reviews.text: They work great for they grill adding an extra 4 inches to the normal 16 inch tong. Strong and lightweight they also work well indoors
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Weber Means Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the grill. My brother loves them. So well made, I always appreciate the Weber quality in their products.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Another Weber Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Long and sturdy. Made by Weber so you know they are well made. Perfect when smoking racks of ribs and briskets and grilling chicken and anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Socal

customer_reviews.title: Quality is pretty good. Will try it on a big steak ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it this past weekend. Works as expected. Quality is pretty good. Will try it on a big steak this coming weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Ghost Leader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tongs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a father's day present. Much nicer then anything we had. Grips nice, long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They would work in a pinch but Feels to Flimsy for my standards.
customer_reviews.author: SGB

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just came a little rusty on one side
customer_reviews.text: It came just a little rust on one side. But it's ok
customer_reviews.author: Javier H.

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I love that they close themselves. A friend of mine took mine because he loves them so this replaces them!
customer_reviews.author: Deyonne M. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use these for small items
customer_reviews.text: These bad boys are a bit bulky to use but will handle the big racks with ease..
customer_reviews.author: C. Hirshey

customer_reviews.title: Really Big
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge set of tongs, great for BBQ's and such with a nice silicon handle and a long length will keep your arm from catching the heat off the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Master Woo

customer_reviews.title: Great, just larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the whole description; these tongs are HUGE. Perfectly fine product, though, well-built and sturdy. Weber rarely disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I recommend them after trying some cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Firm grip but easy to manipulate. Sturdy handle and a nice hanging ring. Very nice. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Brattoli

customer_reviews.title: Great for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: I like that the tongs are long and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great. They are heavy duty yet easy to handle and clean. I like the closed locking feature, makes for better storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ctman

customer_reviews.title: Great For Grilling
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your hand out of heat. Love the long reach and it also cleans up easily. Enjoy using it very much.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Like these bbq tongs
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. We replaced some old wooden-handle tools with these. They go in the dishwasher easily.
customer_reviews.author: SusanJ

customer_reviews.title: Long, strong, down to get my grillin' on...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, longer handle than our previous set of tongs. We have had No troubles so far, have only used once.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tongs. They were a gift and were well received.
customer_reviews.author: RTV

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ Tool
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. When BBQing and picking up meat they actually do the job instead of the meat slipping through the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: NBnEG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a large tong
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly enjoying these tongs. Easy to use for a large tong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but it's a little lose the ends don't lign up quite right.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Can we say No more roasted forearm!!! My husband gets to keep his arm hair since he isn't holding is arm over the grill for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Z's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tongs and great grip! Nothing will slip from this tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Peña

customer_reviews.title: Best BBQ tongs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice "MAN" sized tongs for BBQing. Great quality and better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: evelyn trimble

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now and then go grill!
customer_reviews.text: Tongs are a grill master's best friend. The one's I had were junk. These are perfect for everything I grill. Highly recommend. Excellent quality, which is always a given from Weber.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Davis

customer_reviews.title: MUY PRACTICO
customer_reviews.text: ES UN UTENSILLO MUY PRACTICO Y DEL TAMAÑO IDEAL PARA NO QUEMARSE EN LA PARRILLA. TAMBIEN ES FACIL DE GUARDAR. LO RECOMIENDO
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Ugarte Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these to use on a large community-shared grill. ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to use on a large community-shared grill. Pros: Arrived quickly. Size and quality were in line with what we were looking for. Con: removed one star because the product came with 3 large scratches. They are only cosmetic so we'll keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed that the emblems have already fallen off after just ...
customer_reviews.text: disappointed that the emblems have already fallen off after just two months of use. still functions as intended, but i would expect a bit more quality control from Weber as I have received in the past. hope this is not an indication of what we can expect from Weber in the future. Sad
customer_reviews.author: namicw

customer_reviews.title: The right stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Grilling will never be the same with out this product! I should have bought this item along time ago! Great quality, grips are rubber for a great handle and it isdish washer safe. Grilling is a whole lot better not having my hand almost burned off with a regular size tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Will reserve final judgement once I've used them for s year.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Ehmke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese product with Weber brand badge
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Very loose joint. I was too busy to send these back during the return period and have subsequently put them in the trash after hitting them repeatedly with a hammer. The silicone is cheap, the locking mechanism is stiff, the metal is not ground well and has sharp edges, the tong ends never line up because of the loose joint and even if they did, they are not the same shape/size so they wouldn't line up. This is a terrible Weber product and is clearly a product made by a Chinese firm who simply licensed the Weber brand name (or not?). Absolutely do not buy if you are a serious griller who demands quality and precision in your tools!
customer_reviews.author: PhunkyDork

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well done
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally go for manufacturer-branded items. Most are low to average quality with a logo slapped on them with a steep markup. But these tongs are different. These tongs are specially made for the bbq. Thick heavy-duty stainless steel. Solid comfortable construction. Long reach for the hottest grills. These are what make them different. Instead of a flat grabbing surface, these have the edges rolled inward to really bite when gripping those heavy steaks. The locking mechanism is smooth and sturdy and I love the large easy to grab loop at the end. For $10-15 price range, these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Teem

product_meta.title: Weber 6610 Original Tongs, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: There's not much an amazing set of tongs can't do. Turn ribs, move large roasts, or even rearrange charcoal with the greatest of ease. The Premium Tongs have a no-slip-grip and are long enough to keep your hand far from the flame.
feature_bullets: Unique Front End Design Provides Secure Grip On A Variety Of Food
Soft-Touch Handles Offer Comfortable, Nonslip Grip

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
